series_description: This series documents the audited financial statements prepared by third party auditors that reflect actual operating performance for properties financed by Virginia Housing Development Authority (VHDA) or participating in the Tax Assistance Program. This series may include, but is not limited to: third-party audit reports.

This series documents the annual operating budgets prepared by property owners and management agents that reflect operation projections for properties financed by Virginia Development Authority (VHDA). This series may include, but is not limited to: Budget P&L and income expense projections.

This series documents the audits of properties that have Virginia Housing Development Authority (VHDA) as the administrator. This series may include but is not limited to: Management Occupancy Reviews, audit findings, and correspondence

series_title: Compliance Audit: Tax Credit Properties With Extended Use Period and VHDA Financing
series_description: This series documents the audits for properties with tax credits ,VHDA loan financing, and an Extended-Use agreement. This series may include, but is not limited to: audit findings, annual owner certifications, and correspondence.

series_title: Compliance Audit: Tax Credit Properties With Extended-Use Period
series_description: This series documents the audits of tax credit and ExtendedUse agreement requirements. This series may include, but is not limited to: audit findings and correspondence.

series_title: Compliance Audit: VHDAFinanced Properties Without Tax Credits
series_description: This series documents program compliance audits of that have VHDA-loan financing. This series may include, but is not limited to: audit findings and correspondence.

This series documents the expiration of credit monitoring for credit properties where audits are no longer required by This series may include, but is not limited to: compliance files for tax credit properties.

series_title: Compliance Files: Tax Credit Properties with Extended-Use Period
series_description: This series documents the requirements of the extended-use regulatory agreement that property owners must adhere to during the tax credit compliance period. This series may but is not limited to: Recorded Extended Use Agreements, signed 8609s, 8823s, tax exempt 8703 and 501c3 forms, and correspondence.
retention_statement: 53 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Compliance Property Files: VHDAFinanced Properties With Tax Credits and Extended Use Period
series_description: This series documents the requirements within the extendeduse regulatory agreement that property owner's must adhere during the tax credit compliance period and requirements of VHDA loan financing. This series may include but is not limited to: Recorded Extended Use Agreements, signed 8609s, 8823s, tax exempt 8703 and 501c3 forms, and regulatory loan documentation.
retention_statement: 53 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the monthly operating activities of properties financed by Virginia Housing Development Authority (VHDA). This series may include, but is not limited to: gross potential rent, vacancy loss, statements, and operating

This series documents all multifamily Real Estate-Owned properties for VHDA taken through foreclosure. This series include, but is not limited to: financial and operational disposition documents, appraisals, audits, photographs, and correspondence.
retention_statement: 5 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents housing owner certifications for assistance payments submitted by properties that have VHDA or HUD loan financing. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications and payment information.
